Package ure.things

Class Lightsource

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.things.ThingI
      • ure.things.Lightsource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Interactable, UContainer, UThing
    public class Lightsource
extends ThingI
implements UThing
    A thing which can project a Light into the area at its location.
